data.lyric:
[ti:Tip of My Tongue]
[ar:Kenny Chesney]
[al:Tip of My Tongue]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Tip of My Tongue - Kenny Chesney (肯尼·切斯尼)
[00:05.42]Lyrics by：Ed Sheeran/Kenny Chesney/Ross Copperman
[00:10.85]I love the dimples in the small of your back
[00:15.90]The way they're speaking to me just like that
[00:20.92]Red wine made my imagination run
[00:25.89]Oh I can taste it on the tip of my tongue
[00:29.94]Let it run let it roll
[00:34.87]Baby I am under your control
[00:39.87]Love me fast kiss me slow
[00:45.31]Hang on to anything you can hold
[00:50.05]It's a long way down
[00:52.78]To where I wanna go
[00:55.18]It's a long way down
[00:57.66]To the center of your soul
[01:00.14]It's a long way down
[01:02.66]And I'm a loaded gun
[01:05.22]But I love your salt and sugar on the tip
[01:08.98]Of my tongue
[01:17.01]Girl believe me when I say it's true
[01:21.52]Nobody makes me feel the way you do
[01:25.41]Well I love you from the morning 'til the
[01:28.64]Setting sun yeah
[01:30.77]I can taste the ocean on the tip of my tongue
[01:35.45]Let it run let it roll
[01:40.59]Baby I am under your control
[01:45.50]Love me fast kiss me slow
[01:50.65]Hang onto anything you can hold
[01:55.75]It's a long way down
[01:58.31]To where I wanna go
[02:00.72]It's a long way down
[02:03.26]To the center of your soul
[02:05.84]It's a long way down
[02:08.62]And I'm a loaded gun
[02:10.85]But I love your salt and sugar
[02:13.54]On the tip of my tongue
[02:15.92]Yeah I love your salt and sugar
[02:18.53]On the tip of my tongue
[02:31.28]It's a long way down
[02:36.12]It's a long way down
[02:40.93]It's a long way down
[02:44.22]And I'm a loaded gun
[02:46.31]But I love your salt and sugar
[02:49.09]On the tip of my tongue
[02:51.22]Yeah I love your salt and sugar
[02:53.64]On the tip of my tongue
[02:57.65]I wanna love you 'til my days are done
[03:02.70]I wanna tell you that I think that
[03:05.58]You're the one
[03:07.75]Oh girl you know when it's all said and done
[03:12.28]Everything about you's on the tip of my tongue
data.trans:
[ti:Tip of My Tongue]
[ar:Kenny Chesney]
[al:Tip of My Tongue]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.42]//
[00:10.85]我喜欢你背上的腰窝
[00:15.90]就好像它们在对我说话
[00:20.92]红酒让我脑子里浮想联翩
[00:25.89]到现在 我的舌尖仍有余味
[00:29.94]顺其自然 听天由命
[00:34.87]宝贝 我任凭你控制
[00:39.87]深深地爱我 浅浅地吻我
[00:45.31]坚持到底 不离不弃
[00:50.05]走过漫漫长路
[00:52.78]到达我想去的地方
[00:55.18]走过漫漫长路
[00:57.66]到达你的灵魂深处
[01:00.14]走过漫漫长路
[01:02.66]我就像一把上膛的枪
[01:05.22]但我喜欢你残留在我舌尖
[01:08.98]那咸咸甜甜的味道
[01:17.01]姑娘 相信我 我对你的爱是真的
[01:21.52]你给我的感觉 我从未体会过
[01:25.41]我爱你 从早上
[01:28.64]到日落
[01:30.77]我的舌尖仿佛残留着大海的味道
[01:35.45]顺其自然 听天由命
[01:40.59]宝贝 我任凭你控制
[01:45.50]深深地爱我 浅浅地吻我
[01:50.65]坚持到底 不离不弃
[01:55.75]走过漫漫长路
[01:58.31]到达我想去的地方
[02:00.72]走过漫漫长路
[02:03.26]到达你的灵魂深处
[02:05.84]走过漫漫长路
[02:08.62]我就像一把上膛的枪
[02:10.85]但我喜欢你残留在我舌尖
[02:13.54]那咸咸甜甜的味道
[02:15.92]我喜欢你残留在我舌尖
[02:18.53]那咸咸甜甜的味道
[02:31.28]走过漫漫长路
[02:36.12]走过漫漫长路
[02:40.93]走过漫漫长路
[02:44.22]我就像一把上膛的枪
[02:46.31]但我喜欢你残留在我舌尖
[02:49.09]那咸咸甜甜的味道
[02:51.22]我喜欢你残留在我舌尖
[02:53.64]那咸咸甜甜的味道
[02:57.65]我想爱你 直到我的生命终止
[03:02.70]我想告诉你 我觉得
[03:05.58]你就是我的最爱
[03:07.75]姑娘 你知道 等到尘埃落定
[03:12.28]关于你的一切 我都不会遗忘
